content:
There's been some talk of hacker spaces here and there and I just wanted to mention Artisans Asylum. There's even a Wikipedia page for it: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artisans_Asylum

I went for the first time a couple weeks ago for a talk but I didn't get a proper tour. Maybe we could plan a trip there? Weekly tours are listed here: https://www.artisansasylum.com/hours-info
I've heard about it for a while and was sort of curious about it.
Maybe we could do an early Boston Open event after a Sunday tour.

Yeah, exactly. Maybe after Artisans Asylum we could grab some food and drink at the Charles River Speedway. I've never been but it seems fun. Only a 12 minute walk from Artisans. https://charlesriverspeedway.com
To be clear I couldn't make that today
Ok! I just updated https://bostonopen.dev with the plan! We'll try to do this next month, in June. See #boston > 2025-06 meetup
